['NEW YORK ', 'Performing quantitative research, analysis and development on\xa0\xa0Group’s electronic/algorithmic execution trading systems. ', 'FULL-TIME ', 'The development tasks require writing robust software using good design principles and follow practices like continuous integration for efficient development cycles. ', 'Strong object oriented design and programming skills using Java (or similar object oriented programming language) is required, with good knowledge of using efficient data structures. ', 'The research tasks involve developing research plans, extensive data analysis (usually with large amounts of data on orders, trades and market data) and documenting outcomes as reports and white papers. ', 'Familiarity with some or all of these technologies is required - JUnit testing, Unix environment, multi-threaded programming and NoSQL databases.', 'Candidate should be self-motivated, and have the ability to communicate complex ideas clearly and work well in a collaborative team environment. ', ' ', 'Bachelor or a Master’s degree in Computer Science, with an advanced degree in a quantitative field like Statistics, Financial Mathematics, Operations Research, Machine Learning, or a directly related field. 2-5 years of experience in software development and 1-3 years in quantitative analysis (statistical analysis - regression analysis, time series analysis and/or machine learning). Strong object oriented design and programming skills using Java (or similar object oriented programming language) is required, with good knowledge of using efficient data structures. Experience working with data/statistical analysis software like Excel, R and Matlab, and familiarity with data visualization tools and techniques. Experience researching large data sets related to trading (tick/market data, orders and trades) is a plus. Knowledge of equity market micro-structure and TCA techniques is a plus. Candidate should be self-motivated, and have the ability to communicate complex ideas clearly and work well in a collaborative team environment. Familiarity with some or all of these technologies is required - JUnit testing, Unix environment, multi-threaded programming and NoSQL databases.', 'Use statistical/mathematical techniques and knowledge of US equity market structure (and microstructure) to design new trading algorithms and systems, and improve existing ones, with the goal of providing ‘best execution’ on client orders executed thru our systems. ', 'Knowledge of equity market micro-structure and TCA techniques is a plus. ', '2-5 years of experience in software development and 1-3 years in quantitative analysis (statistical analysis - regression analysis, time series analysis and/or machine learning). ', 'Position Description', 'Experience researching large data sets related to trading (tick/market data, orders and trades) is a plus. ', 'Position Description ', 'Required Experience/Skills: ', 'This position is integrated into the development team and responsible for research and development around algorithm strategies, pricing signals, and TCA.  The position also will work with salespeople and clients to explain and customize our execution offering. ', 'Data Scientist ', 'Experience working with data/statistical analysis software like Excel, R and Matlab, and familiarity with data visualization tools and techniques. ', 'Data Scientist', 'Bachelor or a Master’s degree in Computer Science, with an advanced degree in a quantitative field like Statistics, Financial Mathematics, Operations Research, Machine Learning, or a directly related field. ', 'Required Experience/Skills:', 'Performing quantitative research, analysis and development on\xa0\xa0Group’s electronic/algorithmic execution trading systems. Use statistical/mathematical techniques and knowledge of US equity market structure (and microstructure) to design new trading algorithms and systems, and improve existing ones, with the goal of providing ‘best execution’ on client orders executed thru our systems. The research tasks involve developing research plans, extensive data analysis (usually with large amounts of data on orders, trades and market data) and documenting outcomes as reports and white papers. The development tasks require writing robust software using good design principles and follow practices like continuous integration for efficient development cycles. ']

Provides information and high-level briefings to members, policy makers, the press, and general public in specified fields/topic areas as a result of direct contact or requests from TCB Program or Research Directors, as appropriate.', 'Excellent interpersonal skills; team player', '1.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Serves as a leading authority in the profession, responsible for research stream in human resources area of human capital, both authoring own research as well as supporting research of others, serving as TCB spokesperson on specified field/topic area and related offerings.', 'Exceptional writing skills with a track record of published research in reputable journalsSuperior oral communication skills; a history of public presentations is expectedCustomer service skills in support of our Member companiesStrong project management skillsExcellent interpersonal skills; team player', 'Education and Experience Requirements:', 'e.\xa0Serves as expert advisor for The Conference Board presence on specified field/topic area, and works with high-level experts to increase The Conference Board’s impact in the broad area of specified field/topic area through expanded research projects, services, offerings, and executive involvement.', 'Develops, conducts and communicates research as part of the Human Capital program with particular focus on Human Capital Analytics or Strategic Human Resources.\xa0As a thought leader, incumbent engages deeply with users and peers in the research field to strengthen the track record and reputation of The Conference Board in his/her area expertise. The position requires strong grounding in research techniques and practice, and a record of publication in human capital analytics, or the broader HR/workforce issues of particular interest to the CHRO.\xa0A practitioner background is highly desired. The position requires demonstrated track record of publications in both academic as well as non-academic outlets. Substantive experience to present research findings to business and public audiences is required. The principal researcher works independently as well as in close cooperation with other research staff. He/she works with Program Directors of delivery channels (e.g., conferences, councils and centers), Center and Institute leaders (and their Advisory Boards) to determine subject matter and research content of deliverables so that The Conference Board continues to be a reliable source of timely and relevant information in Human Capital. Serves as TCB specialist & spokesperson in the area of expertise.\xa0Is comfortable disseminating research findings with executives at member companies as well as the public in briefings, small group and conferences settings as well as webcasts. Works closely with, and as part of the team, to add value and research depth to member offerings, as well as support activities to obtain additional funding for parts of the research program.\xa0The position will be filled either a Senior Researcher or a Principal Researcher dependent upon the successful candidate’s experience, expertise and record of publication.', 'a.\xa0Provides innovation, thought leadership, and entrepreneurship for research agenda and offerings in specified field/topic area and Human Capital area overall.', '2.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Serves as the Chair for one or two of the ten Institutes of the Human Capital Center and works with the Advisory Board (both internal staff and external Senior Fellows and Distinguished Principal Research Fellows) to guide content creation and dissemination for the Members of the Human Capital Center.\xa0Ensures the relevancy and quality of related offerings (research, webcasts, quarterly calls with Member executives, community platforms, etc).', '\xa0', 'b.\xa0Works collaboratively with global colleagues at The Conference Board, business executives, and academic researchers across the full scope of research responsibilities from designing data collection instruments in collaborative workgroup to shaping and growing the global breadth and scope of research in specified field/topic area and Human Capital area overall.', 'Ph.D.\xa0in human capital related field (business, psychology, analytics or talent management)', 'd. Keeps current in subject matter specialty, research methodologies and available information dissemination techniques, so as to be recognized as a research expert in the specified field/topic area.', 'Knowledge and Skills:', 'Human Capital analytics, diversity & inclusion, general HR programs, leadership development, talent, employee engagement, workforce demographics, and/or organization effectiveness. ['', 'Drive engagement, retention, conversion, expansion, and resurrection across our customer base by crafting personalized campaigns and in-app experiences', 'Maintain a rigorous and organized view of the experiences and communications we are delivering across our key customer segments', 'Work with product teams to craft and launch experiences to onboard and activate users to new product features', 'Requirements:', 'As the founding member of Coda’s Lifecycle Marketing team, your fingerprints will be all over the process, culture, and company we build in the years to come.', "Coda\xa0is a rapidly growing startup building a platform that enables people to build docs as powerful as an app. We're backed by some of the Valley's leading venture capitalists, and have assembled a world-class team across offices in San Francisco, Mountain View, and Seattle.\xa0Here's\xa0a quick overview of what we do.", 'Responsibilities:', 'Drive engagement, retention, conversion, expansion, and resurrection across our customer base by crafting personalized campaigns and in-app experiencesDevelop lifecycle marketing campaigns across email and in-app messaging channels. You’ll help drive the adoption or build-out of advanced customer engagement toolingExplore, test, validate, and refine potential new engagement and growth channelsWork with product teams to craft and launch experiences to onboard and activate users to new product featuresDeeply understand, research, and segment our users to deliver customized experiences to the right audience. You’ll understand the data driving our customer actions and A/B test your way to better experiencesMaintain a rigorous and organized view of the experiences and communications we are delivering across our key customer segments', 'Aware of how brand assets and creative efforts are perceived, and hold your customer-facing work to a high standard of quality. You can design and create professional-looking communications independently', 'Proven collaborator with strong ability to communicate and drive process with a wide range of stakeholders', 'Coda is looking for our first lifecycle marketer to oversee our user journey and develop the programs for how we guide users through our product. The ideal candidate will use a combination of data, testing, and a high degree of customer empathy to drive activation, engagement, conversion, and expansion. Since Coda is used across a diverse set of customers and use cases with many potential points to drive engagement, this is a unique role for an analytically-inclined customer marketer to be both creative and drive measurable results.', 'Eager to roll up your sleeves with a fast-growing startup and can plan ahead to let your efforts scale down the line. Experienced with the latest marketing and engagement tools and excited about the opportunity to add new ones to our tech stack', "Analytically-driven and rooted in high Emotional Intelligence. Experienced with SQL - you don’t need to be a Data Scientist, but you need to be self-sufficient. You're obsessed with A/B testing, iteration, and finding insight, and love scaling your findings to adjacent areas", '\xa0', "Experienced across all aspects of the customer journey - retention, engagement, conversion, and everything in between. You're interested & invested in how customers move through and experience a product - and how you can help get them thereAnalytically-driven and rooted in high Emotional Intelligence. Experienced with the latest marketing and engagement tools and excited about the opportunity to add new ones to our tech stackProven collaborator with strong ability to communicate and drive process with a wide range of stakeholders", 'Deeply understand, research, and segment our users to deliver customized experiences to the right audience. You’ll understand the data driving our customer actions and A/B test your way to better experiences', 'The role:', "Coda reimagines documents, spreadsheets, and how “applications” are developed. While documents and spreadsheets have remained relatively unchanged for the last 40 years, their paradigms still dominate how businesses and people operate. We're taking a fresh approach at what these fundamental surfaces are ー empowering anyone to start with something as simple as a document that can easily evolve into a powerful, connected application. We’ve seen customers make docs to plan product launches, manage marketing campaigns, coordinate country-wide remote education opportunities, and to run their business full stack (to name a few).", 'Develop lifecycle marketing campaigns across email and in-app messaging channels. ['', 'Under general supervision of the Associate Director of Strategy and Operations within Center for Observational and Real-World Evidence (CORE), the Sourcing Operations Manager provides support in the planning and startup activities of an observational or non-interventional research study. Working with the Study Lead, activities supported by the Supplier Manager may include preparing a request for proposal, assisting in the bid comparisons and reviewing the scope of work and corresponding budget. Depending on the project, there may be a need for a Fair Market Value analysis and/or different compliance activities. The types of projects included may include primary data collection studies, chart review studies, database studies and molecular epidemiology studies, dossiers, lit reviews, etc. In addition to assisting the CORE scientist, the Sourcing Operations Manager will also liaise with members of Procurement and an internal team within the department that manages the creation of purchase orders. Will be assigned to support multiple projects at the same time to shepherd them through the various sourcing and start-up activities. Troubleshoots different sourcing or Fair Market Value issues as they arise and works to bring to timely resolution. May participate in different improvement initiatives, training re-design or metrics development. Must be able to work in a team as well as independently and strong project management skills are essential in order to manage competing priorities.', ' Under general supervision of the Associate Director of Strategy and Operations within Center for Observational and Real-World Evidence (CORE), the Sourcing Operations Manager provides support in the planning and startup activities of an observational or non-interventional research study. Working with the Study Lead, activities supported by the Supplier Manager may include preparing a request for proposal, assisting in the bid comparisons and reviewing the scope of work and corresponding budget. Depending on the project, there may be a need for a Fair Market Value analysis and/or different compliance activities. The types of projects included may include primary data collection studies, chart review studies, database studies and molecular epidemiology studies, dossiers, lit reviews, etc. In addition to assisting the CORE scientist, the Sourcing Operations Manager will also liaise with members of Procurement and an internal team within the department that manages the creation of purchase orders. Will be assigned to support multiple projects at the same time to shepherd them through the various sourcing and start-up activities. Troubleshoots different sourcing or Fair Market Value issues as they arise and works to bring to timely resolution. May participate in different improvement initiatives, training re-design or metrics development. Must be able to work in a team as well as independently and strong project management skills are essential in order to manage competing priorities. ', 'Job Description']

['', 'Requirements:', 'PhD in Cryptography, emphasis on efficient and provably secure protocolsExcellent record of peer-reviewed publications, in particular at IACR, ACM, and IEEE conferencesExperience in the implementation of cryptographic protocols in C or RustWorking well within a cross-functional teamGood understanding of practical systems and their securityExperience as a postdoctoral researcher or industry researcher is a plusExperience with distributed protocols and blockchain protocols is a plusExperience in fast multiparty computation protocols is a plus.', 'Experience in fast multiparty computation protocols is a plus.', 'Experience as a postdoctoral researcher or industry researcher is a plus', 'Write high-quality research papers targeted at top conferences and journals', 'Responsibilities:', 'Good understanding of practical systems and their security', 'Working well within a cross-functional team', 'DFINITY is looking for a full-time Cryptography Researcher, specialized in practical and provably secure cryptographic protocols for blockchains. The main task will be to design, develop, and prove secure, efficient cryptographic protocols for a distributed system and you will contribute in creating a high-performance blockchain computer. We offer a flexible work environment and an opportunity to collaborate with a dynamic and talented team of researchers and developers from around the world.', 'Experience with distributed protocols and blockchain protocols is a plus', 'PhD in Cryptography, emphasis on efficient and provably secure protocols', 'Participate in software architecture decisions, providing necessary information in a clear fashion', 'Design security models, capturing requirements and adversarial models', 'Experience in the implementation of cryptographic protocols in C or Rust', 'Design provably secure, scalable and practical cryptographic protocols', 'Identify functional and security requirements of cryptographic protocols for the DFINITY platform', 'DFINITY is reimagining the Internet as a public network that hosts secure software and services. The Internet Computer is a new technology stack that is unhackable, fast, scales to billions of users around the world, and supports a new kind of autonomous software that promises to reverse Big Tech’s monopolization of the internet. DFINITY was founded in 2016 by Dominic Williams and is backed by top-tier institutions including Polychain Capital and Andreessen Horowitz.', 'Represent the company in academic and industry conferences and share technical information with the public', 'Excellent record of peer-reviewed publications, in particular at IACR, ACM, and IEEE conferences', 'Provide full implementation specification of cryptographic protocols', 'Collaborate with engineers to implement cryptographic protocols', 'Identify functional and security requirements of cryptographic protocols for the DFINITY platformDesign provably secure, scalable and practical cryptographic protocolsDesign security models, capturing requirements and adversarial modelsProvide full implementation specification of cryptographic protocolsCollaborate with a team of Researchers and Developers across our global research centersParticipate in software architecture decisions, providing necessary information in a clear fashionCollaborate with engineers to implement cryptographic protocolsWrite high-quality research papers targeted at top conferences and journalsRepresent the company in academic and industry conferences and share technical information with the public', 'All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status.', 'Collaborate with a team of Researchers and Developers across our global research centers']

['', 'Excellent verbal communications, including the ability to clearly and concisely articulate complex concepts to both technical and non-technical collaborators', 'Experience as a tech lead for these types of projects is preferred', 'BS with 8+ years or MS with 6+ years or PhD with 3+ years of experience. Degree(s) should be in a technical discipline such as Computer Science, Engineering, Statistics, Physics, Math, quantitative social science', 'Data Science platform and infrastructure. You will play a critical role building tools and infrastructure to support Grand Rounds’ vision to be a personal healthcare assistant to our members. A key focus area will involve reshaping and extending our brand new Data Science platform. This multipurpose Spark-based ecosystem will enrich our view of providers and patients through machine learning driven inference and population health statistics. The tooling developed will support a combination of modeling, experimentation, and measurement capabilities to build a rich algorithmic understanding of the clinical needs of our members, the value and efficacy of GR interventions and the propensities for utilization. You will work closely with our Data Engineering and Platform teams, as well as data scientists, to ensure robust modeling and data delivery systems that operate at the required scale and velocity. Structuring data from medical text. Grand Rounds provides more types of care to a broader pool of members than ever before, and we are expanding our ability to process text generated by these encounters to yield structured data. This effort is to help our Care Team scale and generate new insights on our patient population. You will apply a mixture of pipeline expertise, natural language processing, data warehousing, and healthcare domain knowledge to accurately identify and surface information from medical notes. Building modules for our “Match Engine” ecosystem. This collection of services powers our provider matching backend in terms of distributed runtime and deployment services. As data scientists across our team are constantly developing new models and features that will help patients immediately, we aim to publish these into our own integrated platform. You will help solidify, grow, and lead the evolution of the end-to-end systems architecture. As a user-facing real-time prediction environment, we take seriously the notions of instrumentation, optimization of both models and orchestration code, as well as the construction and integration of online and offline experimentation frameworks.', 'Qualifications', 'The Role', 'Data Science platform and infrastructure. You will play a critical role building tools and infrastructure to support Grand Rounds’ vision to be a personal healthcare assistant to our members. A key focus area will involve reshaping and extending our brand new Data Science platform. This multipurpose Spark-based ecosystem will enrich our view of providers and patients through machine learning driven inference and population health statistics. The tooling developed will support a combination of modeling, experimentation, and measurement capabilities to build a rich algorithmic understanding of the clinical needs of our members, the value and efficacy of GR interventions and the propensities for utilization. You will work closely with our Data Engineering and Platform teams, as well as data scientists, to ensure robust modeling and data delivery systems that operate at the required scale and velocity. ', 'Building modules for our “Match Engine” ecosystem. This collection of services powers our provider matching backend in terms of distributed runtime and deployment services. As data scientists across our team are constantly developing new models and features that will help patients immediately, we aim to publish these into our own integrated platform. You will help solidify, grow, and lead the evolution of the end-to-end systems architecture. As a user-facing real-time prediction environment, we take seriously the notions of instrumentation, optimization of both models and orchestration code, as well as the construction and integration of online and offline experimentation frameworks.', 'Double Bonus Points: previous work on medical applications and/or with claims data', 'Previous experience in machine learning, and statistics fundamentals', 'Experience with distributed systems componentry including Kubernetes or other container management, SQL and NoSQL databases, caching layers (Redis, Memcached), compute in Spark or Hadoop, queueing (Kafka, Kinesis, SNS), cloud-based databases (BigQuery, Athena, Redshift)', 'Building modules for our “Match Engine” ecosystem', 'Excellent verbal communications, including the ability to clearly and concisely articulate complex concepts to both technical and non-technical collaboratorsBS with 8+ years or MS with 6+ years or PhD with 3+ years of experience. ['', 'Passionate about bringing the lens of data and research to the product development process.', 'You will manage your own time based on having an in depth understanding of the strategic and commercial priorities of the tribe and business and knowing how your work ladders up into this - you will prioritise based on what work will bring the biggest benefits and you will be able to succinctly and accurately explain this and your decisions to your team so that they understand the context for their work.', 'Research Leadership Skills', 'Creating compelling and actionable research deliverables and insights which inspire empathy and drive both pragmatic and innovative solutions.', 'Key Responsibilities', "You have at least four years' experience leading User Research to aid product development in fast-paced agile cross-functional teams.You’ve been working in an in-house, agency or consultancy role, leading the delivery of end-to-end human-centred research that directly supports shipped products, capacity-building programmes or strategic initiatives.You will have a degree in a related field (for example Human/Computer Interaction, UX Research, Psychology, Social Science, Anthropology).", 'Facilitating brainstorming and working sessions with cross-disciplinary teams.', 'You connect your team’s efforts with a deep understanding of the wider ecosystem around you, working closely with the other researchers in your tribe and cross-functional teams to inform a seamless and human-centred experience. ', 'Experience in healthcare research would be highly desirable. ', 'You are compassionate and caring towards others. You respect the views and ideas of others;', 'You regularly seek to turn ideas into action and inject creativity into every touch point. You question common practice to challenge the norm;', 'You’re a detail-oriented and effective practitioner that consistently delivers high quality outputs and engaging insights.', 'Executing a collaborative research process end-to-end including participant recruitment, creating prototypes and stimuli, and turning insights into actions for product development.', 'Essential Qualifications & Experience', 'You have a passion to build a product that serves humanityYou are compassionate and caring towards others. You respect the views and ideas of others;You work in a straight-forward, collaborative and inclusive way and is non-political;You are tenacious, in the pursuit to delight our users. You strive for excellence in all you do and always look to improve our service and product;You regularly seek to turn ideas into action and inject creativity into every touch point. You question common practice to challenge the norm;Frequently has a can-do attitude and a positive viewpoint;Takes ownership and always delivers against what is agreed.', 'Building strong relationships at a Tribe level and taking on responsibility for the delivery of high quality and robust design research outcomes.', 'You love giving and receiving honest, thoughtful feedback.', 'Familiarity with quantitative research methods, an understanding of metrics and A/B testing, and willingness to integrate quantitative data with qualitative user research', 'You’ve been working in an in-house, agency or consultancy role, leading the delivery of end-to-end human-centred research that directly supports shipped products, capacity-building programmes or strategic initiatives.', 'Flexibly and accurately deploying a number of research methods to understand different user groups. On top of your strong general toolkit, you also have deep specialisation in a few key methods or areas which make you a go-to person in the team:You have demonstrable experience of a wide range of evaluative research methods and techniques.You have led generative or discovery projects for a product or an entire service.You have a wide-reaching understanding of frameworks and psychological principles that you are confident in applying.Familiarity with quantitative research methods, an understanding of metrics and A/B testing, and willingness to integrate quantitative data with qualitative user researchYou proactively and confidently take the lead in syncing up insights across a product area, participating in processes and rituals that help break down silos and socialise cross-functional insights. You take responsibility for sharing insights and creating a strong narrative that ensures people understand what they are building, why, and what impact it will have.', 'You support our team culture of openness and transparency where people feel safe and able to do their best work.', 'Actively shaping how we work together and build products.', 'You have a wide-reaching understanding of frameworks and psychological principles that you are confident in applying.', 'Collaborate with Data analysts, design and product on what and how to measure success in the product. ', 'You have a passion to build a product that serves humanity', 'Understanding and taking into account technical and business requirements when running research, including helping articulate how research is prioritised by the team.', 'You have experience evangelising User Research within a growing organisation.', 'Key Skills Required', 'You have led generative or discovery projects for a product or an entire service.', "You have at least four years' experience leading User Research to aid product development in fast-paced agile cross-functional teams.", 'Frequently has a can-do attitude and a positive viewpoint;', 'Able to communicate research effectively, regardless of audience.', 'You have critical thinking and always ask the right questions to make sure the product strives for excellence and everyone gets the best of each research.', 'You work in a straight-forward, collaborative and inclusive way and is non-political;', 'As well as your craft skills, you are beginning to hone your leadership skills and scale your impact through advising, guiding and reviewing the work of others. You are able to establish rapport with a wide variety of colleagues and are an eager advocate of User Research.You love giving and receiving honest, thoughtful feedback.You support our team culture of openness and transparency where people feel safe and able to do their best work.You connect your team’s efforts with a deep understanding of the wider ecosystem around you, working closely with the other researchers in your tribe and cross-functional teams to inform a seamless and human-centred experience. You have the confidence to say no to work that you feel compromises ethics or quality, escalating concerns on behalf of yourself and your team where appropriate. You support tribe leadership in shaping the future of the product by taking research and turning it into valuable insights that power their decision making.', 'Analysing and integrating app analytics, surveys, market research and other quantitative research data as relevant.', 'Research Skills', 'You will have a degree in a related field (for example Human/Computer Interaction, UX Research, Psychology, Social Science, Anthropology).', 'You will run your own user research as part of a cross-functional team, but also have the skills and passion to proactively support other team members to do research as and when needed.', 'Work closely with designers to provide data-driven decisions and collaborate on the creation of research artefacts to use during sessions (i.e. prototypes). Review together research insights to apply to designs.', 'Experience in healthcare research would be highly desirable. ', 'Babylon Behaviours', 'Defining and documenting our Research Operations processes for patient research in the US, working closely with legal and compliance to ensure our methods are rigorous and ethical.', 'You have the confidence to say no to work that you feel compromises ethics or quality, escalating concerns on behalf of yourself and your team where appropriate. ', 'Takes ownership and always delivers against what is agreed.', 'You are able to establish rapport with a wide variety of colleagues and are an eager advocate of User Research.', 'You’re a detail-oriented and effective practitioner that consistently delivers high quality outputs and engaging insights.You have critical thinking and always ask the right questions to make sure the product strives for excellence and everyone gets the best of each research.Able to communicate research effectively, regardless of audience.Passionate about bringing the lens of data and research to the product development process.', 'You support tribe leadership in shaping the future of the product by taking research and turning it into valuable insights that power their decision making.', 'Collaborating with the other researchers in Self Care to define the Design Research roadmap for Self Care and acting as the named researcher / point of contact for member / patient research in the US . Collaborate with Data analysts, design and product on what and how to measure success in the product. You will manage your own time based on having an in depth understanding of the strategic and commercial priorities of the tribe and business and knowing how your work ladders up into this - you will prioritise based on what work will bring the biggest benefits and you will be able to succinctly and accurately explain this and your decisions to your team so that they understand the context for their work.You will run your own user research as part of a cross-functional team, but also have the skills and passion to proactively support other team members to do research as and when needed.Flexibly and accurately deploying a number of research methods to understand different user groups. Undertaking strategic and tactical research projects that support problem definition as well as solution refinement.Executing a collaborative research process end-to-end including participant recruitment, creating prototypes and stimuli, and turning insights into actions for product development.Work closely with designers to provide data-driven decisions and collaborate on the creation of research artefacts to use during sessions (i.e. prototypes). Review together research insights to apply to designs.Creating compelling and actionable research deliverables and insights which inspire empathy and drive both pragmatic and innovative solutions.Understanding and taking into account technical and business requirements when running research, including helping articulate how research is prioritised by the team.Building strong relationships at a Tribe level and taking on responsibility for the delivery of high quality and robust design research outcomes.Defining and documenting our Research Operations processes for patient research in the US, working closely with legal and compliance to ensure our methods are rigorous and ethical.Analysing and integrating app analytics, surveys, market research and other quantitative research data as relevant.Actively shaping how we work together and build products.Facilitating brainstorming and working sessions with cross-disciplinary teams.', 'You take responsibility for sharing insights and creating a strong narrative that ensures people understand what they are building, why, and what impact it will have.', 'You proactively and confidently take the lead in syncing up insights across a product area, participating in processes and rituals that help break down silos and socialise cross-functional insights. ', 'You are tenacious, in the pursuit to delight our users. You strive for excellence in all you do and always look to improve our service and product;', 'Desirable', 'As well as your craft skills, you are beginning to hone your leadership skills and scale your impact through advising, guiding and reviewing the work of others. ']

job_text: ['Your Mission', '', ' Strong verbal and written communication; collaborative focus ', ' Ph.D. or Masters in Math, Statistics, Computer Science, Physics, Bioinformatics, Computational Biology or another quantitative field with strong foundation in healthcare technology and life sciences ', ' Consistently execute against a product roadmap to deliver multiple features ', ' Proven leadership scaling application development teams that are self-organizing, loosely coupled, yet highly aligned. ', ' Solve some of the most complex problems in healthcare, translating complex data into meaningful insights  Provide support functions around model-building, including data cleaning and code review  Proven technical leadership regarding feature design, enhancement and implementation of complex data science software solutions  Provide support functions around model-building, including data cleaning and code review  Ability to understand and peer review complex, multivariable statistical models and data analytics solutions using machine learning algorithms  Ability to work independently on complex and diverse issues and propose solutions  Proven leadership scaling application development teams that are self-organizing, loosely coupled, yet highly aligned.  Ability to translate business challenges into data pipelines & model framework, owning and driving successful projects  Work directly with our team comprised of the brightest minds in technology, research and mathematics as well as senior interfaces from leading life sciences companies across the globe ', ' Experience with statistical tools and programming languages that allow you to be self-sufficient in handling large healthcare datasets (R, Python, SQL, Java) ', ' Provide support functions around model-building, including data cleaning and code review ', ' Expertise in Natural Language Processing, signal processing and/or image processing a plus ', ' Collaborate with Senior Management and major stakeholders to establish and communicate a technical vision for the solution ', ' Be a hands on coach/player type leader  Solve some of the most complex problems in healthcare, translating complex data into meaningful insights  Design, develop and validate machine learning and AI models for novel medical applications. Consistently execute against a product roadmap to deliver multiple features  Collaborate with Senior Management and major stakeholders to establish and communicate a technical vision for the solution  Productionize data science methods, algorithms and workflows into existing/new products  Work directly with our team comprised of the brightest minds in technology, research and life sciences ', 'Your Education & Experience', ' Ability to work independently on complex and diverse issues and propose solutions ', ' Ability to translate business challenges into data pipelines & model framework, owning and driving successful projects ', ' Experience using Git version control, cloud computing and devops. ['https://campus.und.edu/human-resources/careers/job-openings.html?amp;subcategory=2240+Post+Doctorate+&choosedistrict=true&all=1', '', 'The Wu lab at Univ. of North Dakota investigates fundamental mechanisms of\xa0respiratory infection and immunity to help discover new regulators of disease pathogenesis and progression, ultimately revealing new targets for effective therapy and vaccines of some horrible superbugs’  or pandemic viral (COVID-19) infection.\xa0Concerning bacterial/viral virulence and pathogenesis (Pseudomonas bacterium or SARS-CoV-2 virus), the lab asks how CRISPR-Cas adaptive immune systems regulate pathogen endogenous gene expression to dictate bacterial invasion and alter the host defense using a combination approach (cell biology, advanced microscopy, negative genetics, and RNA-seq). Candidates for the postdoc position with a strong publication record and skills in microbiology, molecular/cell biology and immunology are highly welcome to apply by sending your application to Min.wu@und.edu and directly apply on the website for job ID 7110:']

['', 'Qualifications:', ' • Basic knowledge of epidemiologic or outcomes research ', ' Required Experience and Skills: ', ' • Budget/Financial experience is helpful ', ' • Previous experience supporting operational aspects of clinical/observational research with 2-3 years related job experience, or equivalent. ', ' • Pharmaceutical experience is preferred.', ' • Familiar with assessing Fair Market Value (FMV) beneficial but not required. ', ' Responsibilities:', ' • Must have strong communication and organizational skills ', 'Location; West Point, PA - Philadelphia, PA or Rahway, NJ  locations are all acceptable\xa0', ' Under general supervision of the Associate Director of Strategy and Operations within Center for Observational and Real-World Evidence (CORE), the Sourcing Operations Manager provides support in the planning and startup activities of an observational or non-interventional research study. Working with the Study Lead, activities supported by the Supplier Manager may include preparing a request for proposal, assisting in the bid comparisons and reviewing the Product of work and corresponding budget. Depending on the project, there may be a need for a Fair Market Value analysis and/or different compliance activities. The types of projects included may include primary data collection studies, chart review studies, database studies and molecular epidemiology studies, dossiers, lit reviews, etc. In addition to assisting the CORE scientist, the Sourcing Operations Manager will also liaise with members of Procurement and an internal team within the department that manages the creation of purchase orders. Will be assigned to support multiple projects at the same time to shepherd them through the various sourcing and start-up activities. Troubleshoots different sourcing or Fair Market Value issues as they arise and works to bring to timely resolution. May participate in different improvement initiatives, training re-design or metrics development. Must be able to work in a team as well as independently and strong project management skills are essential in order to manage competing priorities.', ' • Strong project management skills ', " • Bachelor's degree required (areas such as public health, epidemiology, biostatistics, behavioral sciences or biological sciences). ", '\xa0', " • Master's degree is a plus but not required (epidemiology, biostatistics, public health or biological sciences)."]

job_title: AI Research scientist: up to $350,000 base+equity
job_text: ['', 'Responsibilities:', 'We are looking for talented research scientists to be part of the founding team. You will help build the product that applies unsupervised learning to model the world and automatically creates and manages production grade AI systems. As an initial member of the founding team, you get to own a significant chunk of the company, shape its culture and work on state-of-the-art science and technology.', 'Job Description:', 'We are a stealth startup building a cutting-edge cloud AI service. Our founders have a wealth of experience working on various ground-breaking products including self driving cars, AWS AI services, GMail, Google Docs and flash storage systems. We have also previously been founders and early employees at startups. We are backed by Eric Schmidt and Decibel Ventures with Series A funding of $18 million.\xa0', 'General Requirements:', 'Coming up with new techniques in unsupervised learning, dataset augmentation, and deep reinforcement learning that can be applied to automating various parts of the AI development workflow.', 'Candidates will need to have a PhD preferably in Artificial Intelligence or Machine Learning. We are looking for people who have done research and/or published papers in one of the following areas: Unsupervised Learning; Generative Modeling; Deep Neural Networks; Deep Reinforcement Learning; Generative Adversarial Networks; Causal Reasoning. Ideal candidates would be able to rapidly build on new ideas with engineers, potentially publish at top conferences, and be able to write code.']

It’s a place where the Heart/$ philosophy continues to thrive, where we believe that success is only achieved by doing what’s right for our customers, our employees, and our communities.', 'CULTURAL FIT (Our Core Values):\xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0\xa0', 'Expert SAS/R/Python knowledge ', 'Utilize your technical and analytical skills, while also gaining in-depth exposure to business strategy.', 'An ability to work independently with limited direction but with the judgment to do so within appropriate limits of authority.\xa0', '3 weeks’ paid vacation (increased with tenure)', 'act with integrity', 'Analyze data, build models and assess their quality ', 'Experience working with relational databases ', 'Attention Agencies & Search Firms: We do not accept unsolicited candidate resumes or profiles. We reserve the right to hire any candidates sent unsolicited and will not pay any fees without a contract signed by FFN’s Talent Acquisition leader. Thank you for your consideration.', 'Care (for everyone): We show compassion and contribute to the well-being and growth of those around us. We only pursue products that improve the financial lives of our clients.', 'The Sr. or Principal Data Scientist will be heavily involved in executing data analysis and modeling tasks for Freedom Financial Asset Management, the lending division of the Freedom Financial Network.\xa0 The overarching mandate for the Sr. or Principal Data Scientist is to execute on analytic delivery and to develop new analytic capabilities for the company’s mortgage initiative.\xa0 The position will essentially be to partner with the mortgage division to execute a new analytic vision.\xa0 Additionally, he/she may collaborate with other team members to assess and develop new analytic opportunities.\xa0 This role will provide the candidate exposure and visibility into a strategic initiative for the company, and as such, will be a high impact role within the organization.', 'Expert knowledge of logistic regression, decision trees, survival analysis, design of experiment and other statistical techniques', 'Act with Integrity (every time): We take the right action even when it is hard and even when no one is watching. If that sounds exciting to you, we want to talk to you. ['', '-\xa0\xa0Deep understanding of large-scale, distributed systems with an ability to understand large systems with minimal documentation', '-\xa03+ years’ experience programming and scripting in Python', '-Develop a love for all things Crypto: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Blockchain, DeFi, Polkadot, etc...', 'If you believe you are the right person for this opportunity then please apply! ', '-Apply your python coding skills to help advance our goal of automating the influx of data and creating ETL solutions for our internal teams', '-Evangelize technical solutions and innovations among teams for further application', 'How will we track your success?', 'Success across these key areas will have a material impact on the company’s operations, offering exciting opportunities for you to closely collaborate with our talented team throughout the organisation, and grow your skill set.', '-\xa0\xa02+ years’ experience with data modelling within SQL and NoSQL databases', '-Leverage your development experience to build systems that are complete and robust enough to weave the data between automation and human expertise', 'At Bondly, we are a dedicated community working together to solve problems inherent to the world of cryptocurrency. Our products make transactions safe, fast, and easy. Purchasing digital goods and making trades online is risky today, but we are here to help.\xa0', '-\xa0\xa02+ years’ experience working with restful APIs', 'Please note this position is remote and applicants from all countries are welcome.', 'You will be an experienced and motivated data engineer who can own Bondly’s core data flows. You will help maintain a hybrid cloud approach and pass enterprise-scale data volumes. This data comes from a variety of sources both structured and unstructured, including company platform data, web scraped content, and alternative data. You will work with us to collect, analyze, process, and publish the data which is the backbone of our Data as a Product (DaaP) solution. You will report to the Chief Data Strategist.', 'Qualities that are essential', 'We’re looking for people who are passionate about making a positive impact in the world. We’ve built a supportive and inclusive environment where collaboration is encouraged, and learning is shared freely.\xa0We don’t set limits based on what others think is possible or impossible. We drive ourselves and inspire one another to push boundaries and achieve our goals.\xa0', '-We’ll have data flowing from our own Digital Products, from Web Scraping, and from our partner APIs within 6 months.', 'About you', "We'll trust you to:", '-\xa0\xa0A knowledge of cloud environments (AWS and/or GCP)', '-We’ll have our own API built to allow data flow from our proprietary sources to our partners within 6 months.', '-We’ll have clean, scalable, and performant dbs running multi-source data within the first 3 months.', '-\xa0\xa0Experience in Spark, S3, Redshift or Cloud Store and BigQuery', 'Who are Bondly?', '-Help build systems that utilize Machine Learning techniques to learn from human SME knowledge and actions', '-Identify strategic department level technical gaps in our ecosystem and advocate for new technologies and techniques']

job_title: Sr Scientific Researcher, Neuroscience, South San Francisco
job_text: ['', 'Job Facts', 'Qualified candidates will have expertise in a wide range of molecular, cellular, biophysical and biochemical techniques for understanding and manipulating biological pathways.', 'JOB FUNCTION', 'JOB TYPE', 'Research COMPANY/DIVISION', 'Proficiency with primary rodent and iPSC human neural cell cultures, including the ability to manipulate gene expression, is desired.', 'Experience in proteomics and developing high throughput assays is a plus, though not required.', 'Past experience with neuroscience related research strongly preferred.', 'Relevant PhD with a strong research background in molecular and cellular biology.', 'The Position', 'A track record of answering important biological questions, overcoming challenging technical problems, and publishing research findings in high quality scientific journals is required.', 'SCHEDULE', 'Critical thinking skills and an internal passion for scientific discovery are essential.', ' Experience with protein aggregation is preferred ', 'Requirements', 'Relevant PhD with a strong research background in molecular and cellular biology.Postdoc is preferred but not required.Qualified candidates will have expertise in a wide range of molecular, cellular, biophysical and biochemical techniques for understanding and manipulating biological pathways.A track record of answering important biological questions, overcoming challenging technical problems, and publishing research findings in high quality scientific journals is required.Critical thinking skills and an internal passion for scientific discovery are essential.Proficiency with primary rodent and iPSC human neural cell cultures, including the ability to manipulate gene expression, is desired.Experience in proteomics and developing high throughput assays is a plus, though not required.Past experience with neuroscience related research strongly preferred. Experience with protein aggregation is preferred ', 'Who We Are', 'Postdoc is preferred but not required.']

['', ' 5+ years of UX Research experience (or similar relevant experience) Can provide work samples focused on UX Research Experience writing and conducting user interviews Experience designing and conducting user testing of web experiences Experience with remote and in-person user testing methodologies Experience in reporting on user testing results in a concise and actionable way Strong quantitative, analytical, and problem solving skills Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment Exceptional communication and storytelling skills Self Starter; ability to act autonomously Constant attention to detail Experience building flat prototype with Invision Can distill relevant information from a heap of data around product usage ', 'Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment', 'Can provide work samples focused on UX Research', 'Experience writing and conducting user interviews', 'Experience with remote and in-person user testing methodologies', 'Evolve Peloton’s existing user-experience research infrastructure to ensure conducting virtual, field, and in-office user testing is seamless, efficient, and easy to analyze and report on.', 'Implement tools to observe user behavior and interaction remotely.', 'Exceptional communication and storytelling skills', 'Self Starter; ability to act autonomously', ' Evolve Peloton’s existing user-experience research infrastructure to ensure conducting virtual, field, and in-office user testing is seamless, efficient, and easy to analyze and report on. Conduct qualitative and quantitative research using a range of tools and approaches (e.g. interviews, ethnography, card sorting, surveys) to answer Product and UX questions and produce new insights. Help to formulate research documentation to better understand Peloton-specific user behavior. Implement tools to observe user behavior and interaction remotely. Monitor member social and support channels for feedback trends to identify as high impact opportunities for further learning. Consolidate, quantify, and report on the results of any user testing, interviewing, etc. in a concise way to clearly communicate recommendations on product and feature direction. During feature definition, work with Product Managers and Product Designer to identify decision points that may benefit from testing, and define timeline, scope, and methodology for potential testing. Regularly conduct user research and testing on existing Peloton acquisition products, to identify pain points and ensure that the current experience is constantly improving. Document and track learnings gathered through testing and research so insights can easily be referenced and applied for future projects. ['', 'Cortx is looking for someone who thinks artificial intelligence is AWESOME.', 'You will be working directly with the Founder & CEO (who is leading the artificial intelligence team, both as a manager and as an individual contributor) and other Machine Learning Engineers to bridge this gap and build a product that is able to generate high quality, factually relevant and interesting content about any keyword that a user inputs.', 'What we want from you:', 'PyTorch (Hugging Face Transformers)', 'You are an awesome developer with a very strong Computer Science (or very similar) background', 'Cortx is entirely self-funded and is already profitable by selling awesome artificial intelligence products. We want to continue to advance artificial intelligence through sustainable, iterative, and self-funded improvements so that we can eventually reach our end goal while remaining independent and principled.', 'Freedom of working at a small company – you will report directly to the CEO', 'How we plan on getting towards that goal:', 'Part two: Do this\xa0without\xa0selling our souls to venture capitalists or outside investors who will be more focused on Q4 profit, than on making sure this technology creates a profoundly better society.', 'We are a profitable and stable artificial intelligence startup that is building a tool that automatically writes content about any subject with the same level of quality, factual accuracy, and usefulness as a human.', 'What you’ll mainly be working in:', 'What we are doing now:', 'What we are building towards:', 'Our goal is two parts:', 'We have a product roadmap where we create and deliver products that our users love, with the requirement that everything we work on is furthering our research and understanding of complicated artificial intelligence concepts.', 'You are up to date on state of the art research in natural language generation and/or information retrieval', 'Some benefits of working at Cortx include:', 'The excitement of a startup with the stability of a profitable company', 'You have multiple years of experience (professional or research) directly working with transformers to solve natural language generation or information retrieval problems', 'You want to be contributing ideas, values, thoughts, and direction (we are a small company, and your boss is the Founder/CEO, so we want people who want to make a mark on our direction and vision!)', 'Premium benefits – Completely paid health coverage, 401k, profit sharing, gym membership, and more', 'We work on interesting problems that push the envelope in AI', 'We currently sell a product that generates content based on user input using large transformer networks. Our customers love the product, the content looks and reads well, but still is lacking in factual accuracy and relevance.', 'This will involve training new models and making improvements to existing ones. You will constantly be ingesting research papers, finding and implementing ways to take what is cutting edge, and writing production code to apply it to our goals. You will be analyzing where our current methods are falling short and devising and implementing ways to improve and iterate.', 'Generous salary – We would rather have one superstar than two mediocre playersEquity - job_title: Senior Data Engineer - Business Intelligence (Princeton, NJ)
job_text: ['', 'Familiarity with Hadoop ecosystem (HDFS, Spark)Knowledge of RDBMS, MPP systemsKnowledge of streaming technologies like KafkaKnowledge of reporting tools such as QlikSense, Tableau, CognosExperience working in a UNIX or Linux development environment', 'Knowledge of RDBMS, MPP systems', 'Knowledge of reporting tools such as QlikSense, Tableau, Cognos', 'Familiarity with Hadoop ecosystem (HDFS, Spark)', 'Bloomberg runs on data. Our data captures the who, what, when, where and why of how our clients use Bloomberg products. As the Enterprise Data Warehouse and Business Intelligence team, we are responsible for ingesting and preparing massive amounts of data for reporting, dashboards, self-service and advanced analytics. The data will also be used to drive new businesses within Bloomberg by providing new insights.', 'Strong understanding of data warehousing methodologies, ETL processing and dimensional data modeling.', 'Advanced SQL capabilities are required. Knowledge of database design techniques and experience working with extremely large data volumes is a plus.', 'We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.', 'BA, BS, MS, PhD in Computer Science, Engineering or related technology field', 'Experience working in a UNIX or Linux development environment', '5+ years of experience with DBMS, ETL tools. Specific expertise in implementing Informatica in an Enterprise environment is a plus.', '5+ years of experience with DBMS, ETL tools. Specific expertise in implementing Informatica in an Enterprise environment is a plus.Advanced SQL capabilities are required. Knowledge of database design techniques and experience working with extremely large data volumes is a plus.Strong understanding of data warehousing methodologies, ETL processing and dimensional data modeling.Programming experience in PythonStrong problem-solving skills and trouble-shooting skillsBA, BS, MS, PhD in Computer Science, Engineering or related technology field', 'Strong problem-solving skills and trouble-shooting skills', 'Knowledge of streaming technologies like Kafka', 'Programming experience in Python', 'Are you motivated to build robust and scalable systems to handle petabytes of data, with billions of new data points being ingested daily? As a hands-on data pipeline architect and developer you will be working with traditional and modern technologies to enhance our capabilities to analyze large volumes of data with complex business rules. You will work with the business to elicit requirements and implement them in an agile fashion. Our environment combines traditional warehouse technologies, MPP databases, Hadoop, and other technologies']

['', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Competitive salaries, equity and benefits packages', "Key Skills: Quantum Computing, Quantum Algorithms, Machine Learning, Research, Shor's Algorithm, Grover's Algorithm, Quantum Computation, Quantum Information, Quantum Entanglement, Quantum Superposition,", '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0A collaborative team and culture that truly looks after talent and cultivates success', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0A chance to develop novel quantum algorithms alongside world-renowned quantum algorithms experts', 'As a VC-funded startup in the Bay Area, we are keen on bringing in exceptional researchers and developers to aid in developing novel algorithms for cutting-edge quantum computing hardware to be made easily accessible by not only quantum computing experts, but any classically-trained developer or data scientist using any process including binary optimization, machine learning, chemistry simulation, and more.', 'An ideal Quantum Algorithm Researcher will have experience developing and publishing work on quantum algorithms, as well as strong software programming skills.', '\xa0', 'Quantum Algorithms Researcher (Approximation, Simulation, Python)', "Key Skills: Quantum Computing, Quantum Algorithms, Machine Learning, Research, Shor's Algorithm, Grover's Algorithm, Quantum Computation, Quantum Information, Quantum Entanglement, Quantum Superposition, QAOA, Quantum Approximate Optimization Algorithm, Variational Quantum Eigensolver, VQE, Algebraic Algorithms, Number Theoretic Algorithms, Oracular Algorithms, Optimization, Numerics", 'We can offer a\xa0Quantum Algorithms Researcher:', 'We are currently seeking a Quantum Algorithms Researcher (Approximation, Simulation, Python) to join a Bay Area startup ($15 million Series A) whose vision is to break through the global market with their unique, patented quantum computing software. As a Quantum Algorithms Researcher in our company, you will work alongside our world-renowned team of Quantum Algorithms experts hailing from top universities (MIT, Stanford, University of Oxford) helping develop and optimize novel, resource-efficient quantum algorithms to help realize the potential of quantum computing.', 'QAOA, Quantum Approximate Optimization Algorithm, Variational Quantum Eigensolver, VQE, Algebraic Algorithms, Number Theoretic Algorithms, Oracular Algorithms, Optimization, Numerics', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Intellectual challenges that you would not experience in most companies.']

Invents and implements methods and algorithms for threat determination and failure analysis.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Knowledge of common machine learning techniques (random forests, support vector machines, neural networks, Markov models) and associated numerical techniques (gradient descent, backpropagation, sampling, Markov Chain Monte Carlo, regularization techniques).', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Knowledge of Keras/TensorFlow or Torch greatly preferred.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Reviews changes requests and proposals; strategizes future operations.', 'Candidate also:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Mastery of Python, including software design, implementation in built in classes and data structures.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Writes and reviews code to accomplish mission goals.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Understanding of modes of nuclear decay and spectral signatures of each type.', '4.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Work independently while understanding the necessity for communicating and coordinating work efforts with other employees and organizations.', 'Education: ', 'Corporate Performance Standards: ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Mastery of systems level, object-oriented languages, including at least one of C++, C#, or Java.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Must be able to develop a clear vision of projects and move quickly to build proof of concept.', '\ufeffIn the performance of their respective tasks and duties all employees are expected to conform to the following:', 'The candidate will have experience working on and managing small projects in a research group, hands on with building equipment and software, electronics, and mechanical design.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Expert in probability, statistics, and analysis; to include classical statistics and hypothesis testing, Bayesian methods, ANOVA, regression analysis, Fourier and wavelet analysis, time-series analysis, and generalized linear models.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Knowledge of nuclear technology, including reactors and threats.', '2.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Interact professionally with other employees, customers and suppliers.', '\ufeff', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Excellent oral communicator with significant public speaking experience.', 'Clearance: U.S. Citizens Only who have resided in the US for the past 5 years. Must be able to obtain a CBP SSBI clearance with DHS.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with common scientific toolsets using Pandas/NumPy/SciPy/Sci-Kit Learn and Jupyter.', ' ·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Proficiency with database querying in SQL, including knowledge of indexing/partitioning and paging methods, aggregation, and performance tuning. Familiarity with Data Access Object pattern and object-relational mappers such as SQLAlchemy, Django, Hibernate, or Entity Framework.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Familiarity with unit and integration testing schemes, version control (Git), and modern front-end web technologies like React, Angular, Vue, JQuery, and RxJs.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Gives input on staffing levels and allocation.', 'Clearance: ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Must have demonstrated professional experience in analytic technical writing.', 'Location: ', 'Qualifications:', 'Looking for a highly resourceful and motivated candidate who is hands-on in three areas: low energy nuclear physics, data scientist, and development SME on program in providing services to DHS/CBP.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Understanding of common modes of nuclear detection, particularly scintillation, proportional counting, and multi-channel analysis.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Deep knowledge of data structures and algorithms, operating systems, and low-level computer science.', 'The candidate will serve as project(s) leader and mentor to assigned scientists and developers, determines project scope, timelines, and implementation details.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Knowledge of X-ray (MeV energy) imaging of large objects is plus.']

job_title: AI Research scientist: up to $350,000 base+equity
job_text: ['', 'Responsibilities:', 'We are looking for talented research scientists to be part of the founding team. You will help build the product that applies unsupervised learning to model the world and automatically creates and manages production grade AI systems. As an initial member of the founding team, you get to own a significant chunk of the company, shape its culture and work on state-of-the-art science and technology.', 'Job Description:', 'We are a stealth startup building a cutting-edge cloud AI service. Our founders have a wealth of experience working on various ground-breaking products including self driving cars, AWS AI services, GMail, Google Docs and flash storage systems. We have also previously been founders and early employees at startups. We are backed by Eric Schmidt and Decibel Ventures with Series A funding of $18 million.\xa0', 'General Requirements:', 'Responsibilities', 'Coming up with new techniques in unsupervised learning, dataset augmentation, and deep reinforcement learning that can be applied to automating various parts of the AI development workflow.', 'Candidates will need to have a PhD preferably in Artificial Intelligence or Machine Learning. We are looking for people who have done research and/or published papers in one of the following areas: Unsupervised Learning; Generative Modeling; Deep Neural Networks; Deep Reinforcement Learning; Generative Adversarial Networks; Causal Reasoning. Ideal candidates would be able to rapidly build on new ideas with engineers, potentially publish at top conferences, and be able to write code.']

['', 'Strong business and product sense: delight in shaping vague questions into well-defined analyses and success metrics that drive business decisions', 'Product recommendations.', ' Deep strategic analysis to improve our understanding of our advertising platform and its ability to enable us to meet advertiser objectives. Answer core ads measurement questions such as: How can we prove the effectiveness of ads to advertisers? Can we quantify how new ad features will impact key business metrics? How accurate is our offsite conversion data, and how well can we match incoming conversions to Pinterest users? What features of a conversion can help us inform decisions on ad distribution?', 'Excellent communication skills: able to communicate findings with leadership and product teams ', ' Product recommendations. Clearly communicate recommendations to Product and Engineering teams on how we can evolve our internal strategy to address shortcomings observed through deep analysis. Partner closely with Product to develop and evolve our long-term advertiser measurement strategy.', 'The Best Candidates Will Also Have', '4+ years of combined post-graduate academic and industry experience applying scientific methods to solve real-world problems on web-scale data', 'Expertise in at least one scripting language (ideally Python/R)', ' 4+ years of combined post-graduate academic and industry experience applying scientific methods to solve real-world problems on web-scale data Proven ability to apply scientific methods to solve real-world problems on web-scale data Expertise in at least one scripting language (ideally Python/R) Strong business and product sense: delight in shaping vague questions into well-defined analyses and success metrics that drive business decisions Excellent communication skills: able to communicate findings with leadership and product teams  ', 'What You’ll Do', 'What We’re Looking For', ' Strong focus on understanding ads domain and advertiser-focused objectives, measuring ad effectiveness, or similar. Experience with experimentation at web scale. Familiarity with online experimentation and its pitfalls. Experience in the strategic analytics side of data science: shaping decisions rather than just building models Proficiency in SQL/Hive', ' Experimentation: Evolve our experimentation capabilities and tools to evaluate the efficacy of our ad products on advertiser goals and KPIs. Advise on experimentation best practices; identify flaws in experiment practices and results; build tools and frameworks for experiment analysis.', 'Experience with experimentation at web scale. Familiarity with online experimentation and its pitfalls.', 'Proficiency in SQL/Hive', 'Experience in the strategic analytics side of data science: shaping decisions rather than just building models', 'Strong focus on understanding ads domain and advertiser-focused objectives, measuring ad effectiveness, or similar.', '  Deep strategic analysis to improve our understanding of our advertising platform and its ability to enable us to meet advertiser objectives. Answer core ads measurement questions such as: How can we prove the effectiveness of ads to advertisers? Can we quantify how new ad features will impact key business metrics? How accurate is our offsite conversion data, and how well can we match incoming conversions to Pinterest users? What features of a conversion can help us inform decisions on ad distribution?  Product recommendations. Clearly communicate recommendations to Product and Engineering teams on how we can evolve our internal strategy to address shortcomings observed through deep analysis. Partner closely with Product to develop and evolve our long-term advertiser measurement strategy.  Opportunity sizing and analysis. Where is attribution breaking down? Are our brand lift studies biased? What do people do on Pinterest before purchasing? How closely related are the products that a user viewed and purchased? Write clear, actionable analyses that help teams identify areas of improvement and investment.  Experimentation: Evolve our experimentation capabilities and tools to evaluate the efficacy of our ad products on advertiser goals and KPIs. Advise on experimentation best practices; identify flaws in experiment practices and results; build tools and frameworks for experiment analysis. ', 'Deep strategic analysis', 'Experimentation: ', 'Proven ability to apply scientific methods to solve real-world problems on web-scale data', ' Opportunity sizing and analysis. Where is attribution breaking down? Are our brand lift studies biased? What do people do on Pinterest before purchasing? How closely related are the products that a user viewed and purchased? Write clear, actionable analyses that help teams identify areas of improvement and investment.', 'Opportunity sizing and analysis']

', 'Advanced knowledge in Java, Hive, Cassandra, Pig, MySQL or NoSQL or similar. ', 'Manages and responsible for successful delivery of large scale data structures and Pipelines and efficient Extract/Load/Transform (ETL) workflows. ', ' ', 'Qualifications Requirements and Preferences: ', 'Designs and develops complex and large scale data structures and pipelines to organize, collect and standardize data to generate insights and addresses reporting needs. Writes complex ETL (Extract / Transform / Load) processes, designs database systems and develops tools for real-time and offline analytic processing. Develop frameworks, standards & reference material for architecture and associated products. Designs data marts and data models to support Data Science and other internal customers. Behaves as mentor to junior team members to provide technical advice. Applies knowledge of Aetna systems and products to consult and advise on additional efforts across multiple domains spanning broader enterprise. Collaborates with data science team to transform data and integrate algorithms and models into highly available, production systems. Uses in-depth knowledge on Hadoop architecture, HDFS commands and experience designing & optimizing queries to build scalable, modular, and efficient data pipelines. Uses advanced programming skills in Python, Java or any of the major languages to build robust data pipelines and dynamic systems. Integrates data from a variety of sources, assuring that they adhere to data quality and accessibility standards. Experiments with available tools and advises on new tools in order to determine optimal solution given the requirements dictated by the model/use case. ', 'Fundamental Components included but are not limited to: ', 'Strong collaboration and communication skills within and across teams.Ability to communicate technical ideas and results to non-technical clients in written and verbal form.Proven ability to create innovative solutions to highly complex technical problems.Ability to leverage multiple tools and programming languages to analyze and manipulate large data sets from disparate data sources.Ability to understand and build complex systems and solve challenging analytical problems. ', 'Python and Hadoop experience is a must. ', 'Experience building and implementing data transformation and processing solutions. ', 'Experience with bash shell scripts, UNIX utilities & UNIX Commands. ', 'Job Description ', '7 or more years of progressively complex related experience.\xa0 ', 'Has in-depth knowledge of large scale search applications and building high volume data pipelines. ']
